context: NOTES TO CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS (in thousands, except for share and per share data) NOTE 4 — Inventories Inventories consist of the following:

questions.1b8427b0-516c-4fea-b142-3e419a447f89: What was the amount of Finished Goods in 2019?
questions.b9a81c14-263b-4d58-9bd6-8dec2b27ac34: What was the amount of Work-in-process in 2018?
questions.6ddb3562-377d-49f0-8cc0-5bb70c57b178: What was the amount of Raw Materials in 2019?
questions.567c418e-8e2c-489b-bba4-5b7985ee1590: How many years did the amount of Finished Goods exceed $10,000 thousand?
questions.de3e8b87-a5cd-42e9-9fd1-ea0e1381412e: What was the change in the amount of Raw Materials between 2018 and 2019?
questions.398246d7-5500-4560-8a8f-220a782b05e5: What was the percentage change in net inventories between 2018 and 2019?
